Let us enjoy reading this story of The Thirsty Crow!. Once, a crow was very thirsty. The crow searched for water everywhere. “Kaa, Kaa, Kaa…" AT last he saw a pot with very little water in it. He put his beak inside. But he could not reach down the water. The crow thought of a plan. He picked some pebbles and dropped then into the pot one by one. The water level rose.The crow drank the water and flew away happily. Start Quiz
